Headline: 91 Austin Temporary Reroute at Austin/Belden
ShortDescription: 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Fullerton, Narragansett, Grand and over Austin due to, construction near Austin/Belden.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Austin, Fullerton, Narragansett, Grand and then resume their normal route on Austin, due to construction near Austin/Belden.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Montrose. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Montrose.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
